DOC.brief_summary: The study hypothesis is the the results of the use of Gamma nail will be superior to the use of Dynamic hip screw for unstable intertrochantric hip fracture.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of the Results of Treatment by Gamma Nail Versus Dynamic Hip Screw for Unstable Intertrochanteric Hip Fractures
DOC.criteria: patients diagozied with acute intertrochantric unstable fracture a minimum minimental score of 6 ability to walk 500 meters indepedently pathological fracture multiple fractures neurological conditions
